caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A man and a woman are having a clandestine meeting. The man embraces the woman tightly, and she tries to resist, but he holds her firmly. In another location, a couple is engaged in conversation, displaying a high level of intimacy. Their expressions are joyful. Meanwhile, in a room, a man approaches a knight and speaks with him. Afterward, another very strong man enters the room, and they engage in conversation. Later, the knight leaves the room, leaving the man who arrived later to talk. The latter is reporting something to the person on the chair, and his expression is filled with pride. It seems he has accomplished something remarkable.
